subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Closer Aroldis Chapman is “innocent until proven otherwise,” Hal Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ principal owner, said at the owners’ meeting in Coral Gables, Fla.
snippet: Closer Aroldis Chapman is “innocent until proven otherwise,” Hal Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ principal owner, said at the owners’ meeting in Coral Gables, Fla.
